events.text:
Day 421
The moon bunny grows fatter by the day.
No matter how many carrots I feed it, it wants more, like some kind of carrot black hole.
I’ve had to travel farther out to collect them.
I don’t mind the exercise; there’s not much to do here besides roam the moon and sleep.
But why am I here?
I can’t seem to remember.
All I know for sure is that there was a time before the moon and the moon bunny, a time on Earth.
I’m sure it will come to me.
Until then, I had best get to collecting today’s carrots.
